dcterms:description: A spherical version of the MNIST dataset, where all the digits are projected onto the northern hemisphere of a unit sphere. There are two versions: NR (aligned digits) and R (randomly rotated digits). Each version consists of 60000 training and 10000 test examples.
dcterms:title: Spherical MNIST

dcterms:creator: Manolis Savva
Fisher Yu
Hao Su
Song Bai
Xiang Bai
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 51300 3D meshes belonging to 55 classes such as chairs, tables, and airplanes. The 3D meshes are centered at the origin and are projected onto a sphere around the mesh using ray casting.
dcterms:title: SHREC17

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a commonly used dataset in computer vision research consisting of handwritten images of digits 0-9.
dcterms:title: MNIST
